overview: Juliette has an overﬂowing imagination. Neglected from her parents, she survives in the darkness and the loneliness of her room. On her birthday, her Teddy Bear - disappears. Feeling lost, she goes in search of him into a new world outside her room.
tagline: Juliette has an overﬂowing imagination. Neglected from her parents, she survives in the darkness and the loneliness of her room.
title: Le Monde de Juliette
